objects.text:
Multiple Drying Cycles for All Fabrics
Energy-Efficient Temperature Control
Intuitive Digital Display & Controls
Large Capacity for Family-Sized Loads

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Digital Clothes Dryer - Modern Laundry Made Simple
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek white design with modern digital display and intuitive controls
• 🎯 Multiple drying cycles including My Cycle, Mixed Load, Heavy Duty, and Delicates
• ⚡ Energy-efficient operation with precise temperature control
• 🔄 Large capacity drum with spacious interior for family-sized loads
• 📱 Digital LED display showing remaining time and cycle status
• 🌟 Easy-access lint filter maintenance system
• 🔊 End-of-cycle signal to notify when clothes are done
• 💨 Advanced ventilation system for optimal drying performance
• 🛡️ Durable construction with reliable performance
• 🎛️ User-friendly control dial with multiple fabric care options
• 🚪 Wide-opening door for easy loading and unloading
• ♨️ Wrinkle prevention feature available

banner_details:
This promotional banner has a clean and modern layout with a central focus on a household appliance image on the right, labeled under the "product_image" layer. The left section contains a bold headline in uppercase, rendered in dark navy ("heading") and blue ("subheading"), projecting a professional brand identity. Directly below is a compact feature list ("description") using a simple, readable font for clarity. Toward the bottom left is a prominently styled price tag in bold navy ("price"), adding emphasis. A strong call-to-action button ("cta_button") with readable white text ("cta") invites interaction. Minimalist curved borders and a light abstract background complete the design.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #0A3A5C
- Medium Blue: #2C78B6
- Light Blue Background: #F5F9FD
- Text Gray: #333333
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern washing machine with a minimalistic color palette. The primary color is a pristine white (#FFFFFF), dominating the body for a clean and polished aesthetic. The door features a rich black hue (#1C1C1C) that contrasts sharply with the white, emphasizing the central drum. The digital display uses bright cyan-blue (#00CFFF) text on a black background, ensuring visibility and a modern tech vibe. Subtle accents around the dial incorporate gray (#B0B0B0) and hints of vibrant red (#FF3B30) and blue (#007AFF), adding functionality and visual interest without overpowering the design. These blended tones create a premium, futuristic appeal.
